name: LostHope
description:
BackStory:

- A Post apocalyptic Robot Called "Hope" helping the survivals to deliver packages and supplies through high radiation points in the maze of the old destroyed world , "Hope" uses the "LIDAR" Sensor To Scan the Area, and uses "Geiger counter" to Avoid the High Radiation Points.

-------------------------------------------------------
Controls:

      - Only using mouse .
